about_the_game:
Fight. Fall. Rise Again.


Fresh from the forests of Rokar, Until You Fall - A Swordwave OST features all 10 original tracks featured in the game.

Experience over 64 minutes of heart-pounding Synthwave (Swordwave?) crafted to get you back into the fight, mixed and mastered for your listening pleasure in both MP3 and WAV formats.

name: Until You Fall - A Swordwave OST

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 146 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 803 MB available space
